title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper for pulling, listing, deleting and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; Maven Central artifact lets JVM apps chat with local LLMs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models in retrieval-augmented-generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, GPU stacks, and sample apps.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to run Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app (Rust+React) that wraps Ollama for Windows/Mac/Linux.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU and GPU (nvidia) setups with one-command launch.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes or generate text using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + ChromaDB to chat with your PDFs locally.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions via Ollama; configurable slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local LLMs into channels with thread-aware conversations.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama service with async options and RxJS streaming.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for talking to Ollama; pub.dev package enables mobile/desktop apps.
